participant_1.background:
I still remember the feeling of freedom I felt when I would dance in my room alone.
i spend most of my days working at my churchs food pantry.
I was once bullied so badly online that I had to delete all of my social media accounts.
I do yoga with my dog in the park every morning before work.
i work as a receptionist at a lawyer s office.

i love going to the movies.

i am bloated.
I like to spend time outdoors with my kids and explore the local parks and beaches.

content.text: Hi there! I'm doing well, thanks for asking!
I'm glad to hear that! I'm just getting ready for work.
What do you do for work?
I work as a receptionist at a lawyer's office. It can be a bit stressful, but I love it!
That sounds like an interesting job! I've always been curious about what goes on in a lawyer's office.
It's definitely a lot different than I thought it would be! But it's really rewarding to help people.
That's great! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! What do you do for fun?
I love spending time with my family and friends. We go to the movies a lot, and we also like to go camping and hiking.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love camping and hiking too.
Yeah, it's great to get outside and enjoy nature.
I'm trying to get more into yoga. I've been doing it in the park every morning before work.
That's great! I've always wanted to try yoga, but I've never had the time.
It's really easy to get started! There are a lot of great resources online.
I'll have to check it out! Thanks for the tip!
No problem! Have a great day!
